report.title: Get squares list for square and user administration.
report.description: Get a list of squares for display on the square and user maintenance page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false --Get the vice country for the square as it is included in the name label, this is stored in a custom attribute as it is faster than insecting on the fly. LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# AND lav.deleted=false WHERE 1=1 AND #website_filter# AND (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id# OR l.location_type_id=#additional_square_type_id#) #filters#

param.name: square_type_id_chosen_by_user
param.description: Square Type as chosen by the user from the drop-down.

param.name: core_square_type_id
param.description: Core square location type id. We need to inclde this because if the user elects to show all squares we don't actually return all locations types

param.name: additional_square_type_id
param.description: Additional square location type id. We need to inclde this because if the user elects to show all squares we don't actually return all locations types

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.
